main.name: Omar YAYA
main.description: Experienced Software Development Engineer, Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM®), and a compulsive problem-solver with a Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) in Computer & Communications Engineering from Cairo University.
main.bio: Experienced Software Development Engineer, Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM®), and a compulsive problem-solver with a Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) in Computer & Communications Engineering from Cairo University.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to shoot me an email.

education.description: B. Sc. in Computer and Communications Engineering

work.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: Full-stack (REACT/Spring/PostgreSQL) software engineer working on the BlazeMeter Continuous Testing Platform.
Developed RESTful API endpoints to extend back-end features.
Implemented reusable UI components in React that were shared across the website.
Maintained codebase, fixed bugs on front & back ends, and reviewed & approved pull requests.
Worked closely with architects and product owners on delivering user stories and meeting customers’ expectations.

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Software engineer working in the automation & tooling team and member of the open-source review board.
Developed and maintained desktop and web applications designed to facilitate automation.
Led an internal campaign to advertise the team’s services to the company, leading to a 30% increase in requests.
The primary reviewer for the open-source compliance analysis on Valeo’s projects worldwide.

work.title: Bilingual Cybersecurity Support Engineer
description: Managed network security devices (Firewalls, Proxies) and Messaging solutions (MS Exchange, SMTP relays).
Took the initiative to automate time-consuming manual processes despite being in a non-development role. Developed apps still in-use 4 years after I left.
